author: Alex Wickham
title: As Boris Johnson Recovers In Hospital, His Government Faces Mounting Problems On Political, Health And Economic Fronts.
description: As the prime minister’s condition continues to improve in hospital, BuzzFeed News can reveal his government faces fresh challenges on three fronts. View Entire Post ›
content: As Boris Johnson begins what his senior team thinks will be a month-long road to recovery from the coronavirus, ministers have warned that his government faces mounting problems on the political, health and economic fronts as it battles the pandemic in his ab… [+11618 chars]
